mapper.select: /* NewsArticleMapper.getActiveNewsRssTargetList: 활성 언론사/카테고리 RSS URL 목록 조회 */ SELECT A.PRESS_NO , A.PRESS_NM , B.CATEGORY_CD , B.CATEGORY_NM , B.SOURCE_NM , B.RSS_URL FROM news.NEWS_PRESS A JOIN news.NEWS_CATEGORY B ON A.PRESS_NO = B.PRESS_NO WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND TRIM(B.RSS_URL) != '' ORDER BY A.SORT_SEQ ASC, B.SORT_SEQ ASC, B.CATEGORY_CD ASC
